turkish_example_sentence: O pazar günü dağlarda taze yeşil ormanı görecek.
english_example_sentence: He will see the fresh green forest in the mountains on Sunday.
russian_example_sentence: Он увидит свежий зеленый лес в горах в воскресенье.
